trans-unit.source: Represents a footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref> control.
The TableFooterRow class represents a footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control.
trans-unit.target: TableFooterRow 类表示中的页脚行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: This class supports displaying tables on devices with a limited screen size.
trans-unit.target: 此类支持在具有有限的屏幕大小的设备上显示的表。

trans-unit.source: On these devices, a table with many columns and rows must be rendered across multiple pages.
trans-unit.target: 在这些设备上必须跨多页呈现具有许多列和行的表。

trans-unit.source: Adding a TableFooterRow to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control allows you to specify a footer row that is rendered as the last row on each page that displays a view of the table.
trans-unit.target: 添加到 TableFooterRow<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控件允许你指定为最后一行显示表的视图的每一页上呈现的页脚行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the view formats for a table rendered on a device with a limited screen size, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>.
trans-unit.target: 有关设备的有限的屏幕大小上呈现的表的视图格式的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: A TableFooterRow object can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects.
To add content to the TableFooterRow, you must add one or more <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects to the row.
trans-unit.target: 若要将内容添加到 TableFooterRow，必须添加一个或多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>到行的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: Then, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> property of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object in the row to specify the contents of each cell.
trans-unit.target: 然后，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A>每个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>要指定每个单元格的内容的行中的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can add a control to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to specify its contents.
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可以将控件添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>对象来指定其内容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically manage the cells in the TableFooterRow by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过以编程方式管理 TableFooterRow 中的单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> collection is a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects that represent the cells in the row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>集合是一个集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>表示行中的单元格的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TableFooterRow inherits properties from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> that allow you to control how the contents in the row are displayed.
trans-unit.target: TableFooterRow 继承属性从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>，可让你控制如何显示行中的内容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.HorizontalAlign%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.VerticalAlign%2A> properties to specify the alignment of the contents.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.HorizontalAlign%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.VerticalAlign%2A>属性以指定内容的对齐方式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.VerticalAlign%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.HorizontalAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableFooterRow"></xref> class.
